builds.strategy: The infinite scaling engine: Every source of healing (Clemency leech, Voracity, Wicked Vitality, Combat First Aid) feeds Glacial Core, which converts 272% of healing into cold damage shards. Each cold shard triggers Frost, dealing 10% of max HP as cold damage and permanently increasing max HP by 1. Pain adds 40% AoE splash to every single damage instance - every cold shard, every Frost hit, every Reflex retaliation splashes across the pack. Giant adds 260 base max HP and scales ALL damage by 1% per 50 max HP, compounding with Frost's permanent HP growth. Reflex triggers 120% Cold retaliation + 40 Armor every time you take damage, creating additional Frost triggers and Glacial Core fuel. Bleakness gives 50% bonus damage to enemies stunned by Frost or slowed by Freezing. Against packs: Freezing applies cold burst, Frost stuns and grows HP, Pain splashes everything, Glacial Core fires shards everywhere, and each shard triggers more Frost. The build becomes exponentially stronger as max HP grows - a 1000 HP Shell deals 100 cold damage per Frost trigger, a 2000 HP Shell deals 200.
strengths: Glacial Core + Frost 18pt infinite HP scaling loop
Pain's 40% AoE splash on ALL damage (0-use essence, massively underutilized)
Giant scales damage with growing HP pool (compounds with Frost)
50% damage bonus from Bleakness on stunned/slowed enemies
120% Cold retaliation from Reflex on every damage intake
Exponential scaling - damage grows as max HP grows permanently
Self-sustaining through Clemency/Voracity healing feeding Glacial Core
Multiple defensive layers (Rigidity barriers, Reflex armor, Aftershock armor, Snow barrier)
weaknesses: Slow initial ramp-up before HP scaling kicks in
Cold-focused - less effective against cold-resistant enemies
Requires Glacial Core (unique) and multiple epic essences

builds.strategy: Everything feeds the cold engine. Clemency leech and Voracity healing constantly feed Glacial Core, which converts 272% of all healing to cold damage shards. Every cold shard triggers Frost for 10% max HP cold damage + permanent HP growth + stun. Frost stuns enable Bleakness's 50% damage bonus on the ENTIRE build. Paranoia auto-casts Repulsive Shield on damage, generating more cold shards. Reflex fires 120% Cold retaliation + 40 Armor on every damage intake, also triggering Frost. Freezing releases 160% Cold bursts. Aftershock's delayed shockwave stuns and grants armor. Rigidity builds barriers on every cold hit (80% bonus). Snow fires passive snowballs for additional Frost triggers. The result: enemies are permanently slowed/stunned (Bleakness always active), Glacial Core fires cold shards constantly (Clemency/Voracity/Wicked Vitality/Combat First Aid all feeding it), Frost hits grow stronger as max HP permanently increases, and Rigidity barriers keep you nearly invincible. Against bosses, the permanent HP growth means Frost's 10%-of-max-HP hit becomes devastating over time.
strengths: Glacial Core + Frost 18pt infinite HP/damage scaling loop
50% damage bonus from Bleakness on permanently CC'd enemies
Seven cold trigger sources (Glacial Core, Frost, Reflex, Freezing, Aftershock, Snow, Rigidity)
Self-sustaining - damage dealt creates healing which creates cold damage
Permanent HP growth makes Frost hits exponentially stronger
Near-permanent barrier uptime from Rigidity on cold hits
Multiple armor sources (Reflex 40, Aftershock 22, Stone Skin 11)
weaknesses: Slow initial ramp-up before HP scaling and cold damage compound
Lower burst damage compared to fire or dark builds
Requires specific essence combination for the engine to function
